name: Launch 2031AD
overview: Launch 2031AD is a 1-player arcade game for the VIC-20. The player launches a spaceship from the bottom of the screen, which tries to navigate between horizontally moving asteroids to reach the top. Green asteroids move particularly facst, while some asteroids have holes that allow the spaceship to pass through. The player starts with 10 lives, and after 10 passes the game speed increases.
